tool_description: Enhances scanned images by correcting rotation, adjusting contrast, removing noise, and optimizing for OCR processing.

input_image_path.description: Path to the input scanned image file

auto_rotate.description: Automatically detect and correct document rotation

noise_reduction.description: Apply noise reduction filters to clean up image artifacts

edge_enhancement.description: Sharpen edges to improve text clarity

error_messages: Image file not found: Verify the input_image_path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported image format: Use common formats like JPEG, PNG, or TIFF.
Invalid contrast factor: Value must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
Processing failed: Image may be corrupted or too low quality to process.
Insufficient disk space: Ensure adequate storage for processed image output.
usage: Provide input_image_path to the scanned image, enable auto_rotate and noise_reduction for most documents, adjust contrast_enhancement for faded documents, and use edge_enhancement sparingly for very blurry text.

processed_image_path.description: Path to the enhanced image file
